name: @npm-questionpro/wick-ui-icon
description: Icon font library with Material and custom icons for QuestionPro

scripts.release:patch: pnpm build && pnpm version patch && pnpm publish
scripts.release:minor: pnpm build && pnpm version minor && pnpm publish
scripts.mat:update: cd material-design-icons && mv .git_bak .git && git pull && mv .git .git_bak && cd .. && node material.js && pnpm build
